text: <prosody rate="-5%" pitch="-0%"><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="kɑn'ɐmɑθɑh">Kāṇamātā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="1.000s"/> <break time="0.001s"/><phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="uθθɐɺɑh">Uttarā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="nɐndɐ’s">Nanda’s</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> mother <break time="1.000s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="vɪsɑkʰɑh">Visākhā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> Migāra’s mother <break time="1.000s"/> the lay woman <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="kʰuʝ.ʝuθθɐɺɑh">Khujjuttarā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="1.000s"/> the lay woman <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="sɑmɑvɐθiː">Sāmāvatī</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="1.000s"/> <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="suppɐvɑsɑh">Suppavāsā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> the <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="kolɪjɐn">Koliyan</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="1.000s"/> the lay woman <phoneme alphabet="ipa" ph="suppɪjɑh">Suppiyā</phoneme><break time="0.001s"/> <break time="1.000s"/> the housewife Nakula’s mother <break time="1.000s"/></prosody>
